memberdef.name: NECSimMethods

briefdescription.para: A python object for running the main simulation from a configuration file. Called in python by necsim.run_from_config("path/to/file")

parameterdescription.para: the python object to pass forwards
the path to the configuration file

simplesect.para: NULL if error raised, the python return object (as a long) otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Resumes the simulation from the given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: the python object to call from
the arguments to supply to the resume code

simplesect.para: NULL if error raised, the python return object (as a long) otherwise.

briefdescription.para: A python object for running the main simulation from a configuration file, using protracted speciation. Called in python by necsim.run_from_config("path/to/file")

parameterdescription.para: the python object to pass forwards
the path to the configuration file

simplesect.para: NULL if error raised, the python return object (as a long) otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Resumes the simulation from the given parameters for protracted speciation.

parameterdescription.para: the python object to call from
the arguments to supply to the resume code

simplesect.para: NULL if error raised, the python return object (as a long) otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Contains the functions allowing integration of the PyCoalescence python module directly to the c++.
